reviewText: Not good for instruction, see title.

Don't let the 2007 date fool you.  This video is old.  There has been many rule/equipment changes since this video was made.  The fundamentals are still good though.  Video does not cover much beyond the fundamental strokes.
Might be good if you can understand Japanese or maybe Chinese. Don't know which of these languages it's in. Impossible to try to read the subtitles and follow the table tennis.
